tool_description: An API that shows the current news related to all the climate changes in the world. Most of the news sources are taken from UK's Newspaper, One from Bangladesh. This is the first version of this API. I'll update it, day by day.
name: Climate Change Report
title: Climate Change Report

api_list.name: Get specific News source news.
api_list.description: To get the news from specific news from your favorite newspapers.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-report.p.rapidapi.com/news/thetimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-report.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-report.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspapaerid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-report.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all the climate change news.
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about climate change from all the news sources.
